name: Untitled Dungeon (JackBeterson)
description:
Untitled Dungeon

You play as a knight who is on a quest to defeat the demon that inhabits the dungeon..

This is a 2D dungeon crawler where you will be slaying monsters and collecting chests in hopes of ridding the kingdom of the demon that raveges it.

This game is a prototype based off of this course:

Art Pack Used: 

https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-dungeon-tileset

Controls:

Move:   WASD

Attack:  Space 

It is recommended you play in full screen.
